node.excerpt: More details about the CFP can be found here: PyOhio Call For ProposalsWhen you're ready to submit a proposal:go to cfp.pyohio.orgcreate an account (or login if you created an account last year)Update your speaker profileSubmit talk/tutorial proposalFor more information on how we select talks see our selection process.We also need help reviewing proposals! If you'd like to help see our sign-up…

Sponsorship spots are open now! Please see the Sponsorship Prospectus for detailsKey dates:The conference will be July 27-28 at The Ohio Union in Columbus, OHThe CFP for talks and tutorials will open in late March or early AprilRegistration and t-shirt sales will open in late AprilVolunteer sign-ups will open in AprilKeep in touch:Subscribe to our mailing list for major announcementsFollow us on…
